metadata.Title: CVE-2023-36054 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: lib/kadm5/kadm_rpc_xdr.c in MIT Kerberos 5 (aka krb5) before 1.20.2 and 1.21.x before 1.21.1 frees an uninitialized pointer. A remote authenticated user can trigger a kadmind crash. This occurs because _xdr_kadm5_principal_ent_rec does not validate the relationship between n_key_data and the key_data array count.

criterions.comment: krb5 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
